title: Your appeal will be decided by an independent tribunal
reviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your entitlement to the {{benefitType}}{{benefitEndText}}.
UCreviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision.
IBAreviewed: Your appeal will be reviewed by a tribunal made up of a {{tribunalPanel}}. They will consider everything you tell them and make a decision on your {{benefitType}}{{benefitEndText}}.
